Data: Bracken to Mahela Jayawardene, no run good ball, slower and back of a length outside off stump, angles past Jayawardene and then straightens, forcing him to hold back on his shot
Bracken to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run back of a length again, this time there's no movement and Jayawardene pushes it off the back foot with soft hands, the ball runs to gulley
Bracken to Silva, no run a tad fuller, good length, moves past Silva's tame attempt at a forward prod
Bracken to Silva, no run full and angled across the stumps, tempting him to fish or drive at it, but Tharanga is wise to the task and shoulders arms with a stride forward
Bracken to Silva, no run again angled past him and he gets a look in at it and shoulders arms
Bracken to Silva, no run good length on off stump, drawing him forward, theres a thick edge all along the ground to gulley this time
McGrath to Mahela Jayawardene, no run back of a length outside off stump, Jayawardene gets up and defends down into the ground outside off
McGrath to Mahela Jayawardene, no run back of a length outside off stump as usual, again he gets up and defends to point with a firm 'No, wait!" to Silva
McGrath to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs yowza! McGrath opts for a long-hop on off stump, and in a flash Jayawardene gets over it, pulling powerfully past square leg for four
McGrath to Mahela Jayawardene, no run as expected, fuller outside off stump and he comes forward and pushes into the covers confidently
McGrath to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs there's another attempted bouncer down leg stump, moves down, Jayawardene chases with the pull, doesnt connect well and its wide of Gilchrist for four more
McGrath to Mahela Jayawardene, no run fuller outside off stump, moves in, he gets over it and defends back down the track
Tait to Silva, no run drifts down leg stump, he gets well forward flicks across the line but cant beat square leg

Tait to Silva, FOUR runs short of a length outside off stump, kicks off the surface, Silva's feet go nowhere as he flashes at it, surprised by the bounce, and the thick edge fairly speeds over slip for four
Tait to Silva, no run really short of length on middle and off stump, he gets forward and ducks down
Tait to Silva, FOUR runs another short one outside off stump, but this time Silva gets right over it, spanking an excellent square cut smack in the gap at point
Tait to Silva, 1 wide surprise, surprise, a frustrated Tait bounces him outside leg stump and a wide is called
Tait to Silva, no run much better, full in the blockhole, Silva gets over it and flicks to mid-on
Tait to Silva, no run short-pitched outside off stump, he swivels on the pull and connects with air, stare from Tait
McGrath to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run fraction short and wide, Jayawardene rolls the wrists and cuts it down in the gap at gulley for one to third man
McGrath to Silva, no run fuller outside off stump this time, Silva gets over it and defends to the off side, telling his captain to stay put
McGrath to Silva, no run good length outside off stump, he covers off and shoulders arms
McGrath to Silva, 1 run good length outside off stump, he lunges forward and defends, the ball runs along the ground to third man
McGrath to Mahela Jayawardene, no run back of a length just outside off stump, Jayawardene eyes it up and leaves it be close to his body
McGrath to Mahela Jayawardene, no run even closer to off stump, on a length, he covers off and shoulders arms once more
Tait to Silva, no run overpitched on leg stump, flicked straight to midwicket
Tait to Silva, 1 run fuller this time on off stump, pushed down the ground, balls slows up and they pinch a quick single
Tait to Mahela Jayawardene, no run short of a length outside off stump, chopped to point
Tait to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 wide full and wide down leg stump, wide called
Tait to Mahela Jayawardene, 2 runs fullish outside off stump, he gets forward and pushes into the gap between cover and point and runs hard for two
Tait to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run overpitched on off stump again, nicely driven back down the ground, mid-off moves across and keeps them to one
Tait to Silva, 1 run full on off stump, he gets forward and jams it down
Hogg to Silva, 1 run tossed up down leg stump, Silva sweeps past square leg
Hogg to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run quicker and flatter outside off stump, driven to cover
Hogg to Silva, no run tossed up on the stumps, spins in, Silva goes back and defends it solidly
Hogg to Silva, no run looped up on off stump, defended back
Hogg to Silva, no run quicker and fuller on off stump, turned to square leg
Hogg to Silva, no run fizzed up just outside off stump, defended
Symonds to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run back of a length on off stump, turned to square leg
Symonds to Silva, 1 run fuller on middle and leg, nicely flicked into midwicket for one
Symonds to Mahela Jayawardene, no run beaten by one that lands on a good length outside off stump and moves just a little
Symonds to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run good length on off stump, turned with the wrists to Clarke at square leg for the single

Symonds to Silva, 2 runs strays straighter on middle and leg, and Silva works it behind square out to McGrath in the deep, who fires in a throw over Gilchrist's head and nobody backs up, so a second is given up
Symonds to Silva, no run fuller on off stump, defended back to Symonds
Hogg to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run short on off stump, no spin, he gets down and pulls past square leg
Hogg to Silva, no run tossed up on off stump, Silva sweeps but cant beat Clarke at short fine leg
Hogg to Silva, no run shorter, spinning into the ribs, he shuffles and looks to pick one in front of Clarke, but Jayawardene wisely says no
Hogg to Silva, no run nicely looped up on middle and off, the wrong 'un, defended back by Silva
Hogg to Silva, no run quicker on middle and off, he uses the feet and drives to mid-on
Hogg to Silva, no run tossed up on a nice length just outside off stump, forcing Silva to get well forward and defend
Symonds to Mahela Jayawardene, no run good one, straighter on the stumps, pushed to mid-off
Symonds to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run back of a length outside off stump, he waits for it and opens the face to run it down to third man
Symonds to Silva, 2 runs strays down leg stump, Silva clips it around the corner and old Pidgeon has some flying to do down at fine leg...and lo and behold, he uses the boot to save four
Symonds to Silva, no run good length outside off stump, he comes forward and defends
Symonds to Silva, no run good length again on off stump, played softly in front of point
Symonds to Silva, no run steams in, locks swaying in the wind, bends his back, grunts, its full and Silva square-drives to backward point
Hogg to Mahela Jayawardene, no run tossed up, driven to mid-off off the front foot
Hogg to Mahela Jayawardene, no run tossed up, and again he gets forward and drives to the man at mid-off
Hogg to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run this one's shorter and quicker on middle and leg, awkwardly played past a diving Clarke at square leg
Hogg to Silva, no run dances out, Hogg sees him and fires it wide and quick, Silva reaches out and chops to backward point
Hogg to Silva, no run loops up the wrong 'un out the back of the hand, well picked and driven to cover
Hogg to Silva, 1 run straighter on the stumps, picked and flicked to square leg for one
Symonds to Silva, FOUR runs nicely done, strays down the wrong line and Silva helps it on its way with a good little deflection to fine leg
Symonds to Silva, 1 run too straight again and Silva works it fine for a single
Symonds to Mahela Jayawardene, no run better line, more off stumpish, Jayawardene shufles and flicks to square leg
Symonds to Mahela Jayawardene, (no ball) oversteps this time, the balls on off stump and he works it to square leg
Symonds to Mahela Jayawardene, no run good length on off stump, flicked in the air to midwicket but its safe
Symonds to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run drifts down leg stump and its paddled away in the air behind square
Symonds to Silva, no run quicker, by Symonds standard anyways, and Silva comes forward and defends back down the track
Hogg to Mahela Jayawardene, no run tossed up on middle and off, turned to Clarke at square leg
Hogg to Mahela Jayawardene, no run tossed up on middle and leg, turns down as he looks to tickle it
Hogg to Mahela Jayawardene, no run quicker, comes down and spins in, Jayawardene gets it off the pad and it hits his back leg, he then deflects it as it rolls towards leg stump
Hogg to Mahela Jayawardene, no run tossed up on a length, defended
Hogg to Mahela Jayawardene, no run quicker on off stump, pushed into the covers
Hogg to Mahela Jayawardene, 2 runs short and wide, and he cuts nicely out to deep point
Clarke to Silva, 2 runs on a length, spins in, Silva makes room and cuts through point for an easy couple
Clarke to Silva, 2 runs tossed up, comes out a high full toss outside off stump, he smashes it to short third man, who fumbles and allows two
Clarke to Silva, no run fizzed up on off stump, defended
Clarke to Silva, no run tossed up invitingly again, but he defends
Clarke to Silva, no run a tad shorter, spins in, and Silva's saved by the inside-edge back onto the pads, well bowled
Clarke to Silva, no run quicker and fuller on middle and leg, turned in front of short square leg
Hogg to Mahela Jayawardene, no run tossed up on the stumps, he flicks to Symonds at mid-on
Hogg to Mahela Jayawardene, 2 runs just a fraction shorter, spins in, but he goes back and pulls past mid-on for a brace
Hogg to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run nicely done, spins in off a length, very close to off stump, but he goes back and plays it right in front of Gilchrist's gloves for one
Hogg to Silva, 1 run tossed up full on leg stump, swept down to fine leg for one
Hogg to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run tossed up on off stump, Jayawardene gets down onto one knee and sweeps through square, Hussey in the deep moves quickly and keeps them to just one
Hogg to Silva, no run tossed up on off stump, pushed to backward point, no chance of a run there
Clarke to Mahela Jayawardene, no run tossed up just outside off stump, he comes forward and pushes at it gently, and the inside-edge roll past leg stump
Clarke to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run fuller and faster on off stump, he gets down and sweeps in front of the stumps for one, with the spin
Clarke to Silva, no run slower, he waits for it and then opens the face of the bat, steering to backward point
Clarke to Silva, no run flatter trajectory, he rocks back and cuts to Hogg at short third man
Clarke to Silva, no run quicker on middle and off, he goes back and works it to square leg
Clarke to Silva, no run tossed up on off stump, defended, and a very good over comes to an end
Hogg to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run tossed up, he uses the feet well and flicks out to Tait at deep midwicket
Hogg to Silva, no run comes out, Hogg sees him, fires it quicker and Silva has to defend it back
Hogg to Silva, no run nicely done, tossed up on off stump, Silva defends it
Hogg to Silva, FOUR runs well struck, tossed up on middle and off, down he goes, sweeping hard in the gap behind square for four
Hogg to Silva, no run looped up on off stump, played back to Hogg
Hogg to Silva, 1 run tossed up again on off stump, he sweeps past square leg for one
Clarke to Silva, no run tossed up outside off stump, he pushes to cover
Clarke to Silva, 1 run tossed up again, down he goes, getting the front leg out and sweeping with the spin to square leg
Clarke to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run quicker outside off stump, chopped to point
Clarke to Silva, 2 runs again looped up, and Silva brings up the 100 for Sri Lanka with a deft sweep down to McGrath at fine leg
Clarke to Silva, 1 run quicker through the air outside off stumo, pushed into the covers
Clarke to Mahela Jayawardene, no run tossed up, he uses the feet and drives in the air towards mid-off, but it lands safely
McGrath to Silva, no run begins with a bouncer just outside off stump, Silva ducks down as it sails over his helmet
McGrath to Silva, no run short of a length outside off stump, gets over it and chops wide of Clarke at backward point, who moves quickly and cuts it off
McGrath to Silva, 1 run fuller on off stump, shuffles and flicks into midwicket, where Hodge does the fielding and flicks in a throw back to the stumps but misses
McGrath to Mahela Jayawardene, 2 runs close, very close! Dragged in somewhat short, comes in, Jayawardene pulls just over short midwicket's head
McGrath to Mahela Jayawardene, no run back of a length, opens the face and runs it fine, but has to contend with an athletic Hayden at short third man
McGrath to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs positive shot, came down a step, picked up a good length delivery and hammered it over mid-off, one bounce and four
Tait to Silva, no run fullish on off stump, shuffles and drives straight to Bracken at mid-on
Tait to Silva, FOUR runs lovely shot, overpitched outside off stump, Silva gets down and executes a cover drive in the gap at cover, and Tait continues to bleed runs
Tait to Silva, no run shorter one now, on about off stump, but instead of pulling over midwicket he hits it into the ground in front of square leg
Tait to Silva, no run too full on leg stump, and this time Silva cant put it away, just finding short midwicket
Tait to Silva, no run good yorker-length ball on leg stump, dug out back down the track to Tait
Tait to Silva, no run back of a length outside off stump, he hops across and pushes it down to backward point
McGrath to Mahela Jayawardene, no run good length outside off stump, shapes to sweep, but has to change his shot to steer to backward point
McGrath to Mahela Jayawardene, no run short, he pulls across the line but cant beat Hussey at short midwicket
McGrath to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run short of a length on off stump, he stands up and works it around the corner for one, well played
McGrath to Silva, 1 run shortish again, not enough to pull but he does so anyway, almost falling over, ends up hitting it into the ground wide of square leg
McGrath to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs full on leg stump, down he goes, paddling it around the corner, no fine leg, and thats four
McGrath to Mahela Jayawardene, no run back of a length on off stump, an aggressive on-drive this time but straight to mid-on
Tait to Silva, 1 run good length outside off stump, driven to Hayden at point, who initially moves right and then dives back to his left to save runs
Tait to Mahela Jayawardene, no run fuller outside off stump, he gets down and guides it to backward point
Tait to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs shot, man! Full and moving down leg stump, woeful delivery from Tait with fine leg up, and Jayawardene flicks it away for four
Tait to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 wide full and wide, down leg stump, and called
Tait to Mahela Jayawardene, no run slower one good length outside off, driven to point
Tait to Mahela Jayawardene, SIX runs fifty up for Jayawardene, and the 100-run stand, with an authorititative hook shot well over deep backward square leg, immense shot for half a dozen
Tait to Mahela Jayawardene, 2 runs full on leg stump, easy pickings for him to clip it out to the man on the ropes for two
Bracken to Silva, no run good start, shaping one across him, he plays and misses
Bracken to Silva, no run slower one, beats him again with the angle, sits up a little too, well bowled
Bracken to Silva, no run quicker one off an excellent length, squares up Silva as he plays for the turn
Bracken to Silva, no run good length on off stump, Silva hurries to defend it to point
Bracken to Silva, 1 run back of a length, slower ball, enough room for him to open the face and place it wide of Clarke at backward point
Bracken to Mahela Jayawardene, no run fuller, wider, and the angle beats Jayawardene's bat too as Gilchrist whips off the bails for fun
Tait to Silva, 1 run full on off stump, he just nudges it to mid-off to raise his fifth ODI half-century, and fourth in this tournament, well played, sir
Tait to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run overpitched outside off stump, Jayawardene square-drives out to deep point for one
Tait to Silva, 1 run overpitched well wide of off stump again, now Silva flashes an airy square-drive in the gap out to Hussey near the ropes
Tait to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 leg bye short one, bouncer outside off stump, he shapes to pull, misses, gets hit high on the arm and picks up a run
Tait to Silva, 1 run half-volley outside off stump, driven square of the wicket for an easy single
Tait to Mahela Jayawardene, 2 runs looks for the yorker, comes out a low full toss on leg, nicely flicked past square leg for an easy couple
Hogg to Silva, 1 run flat on middle and leg, he shuffles and works it out to McGrath at deep backward square leg
Hogg to Mahela Jayawardene, no run slowly tossed up outside off stump, pushed to mid-off
Hogg to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run quicker and flatter on middle and leg, he looks for some sort of paddle-pull, bobbled up in the air and down to fine leg
Hogg to Silva, 1 run tossed up on middle and leg, swept out to deep square again

Hogg to Mahela Jayawardene, 3 runs short and wide, asking for trouble, he cuts hard in the air behind square, the balls travelling fast, Hayden covers a lot of ground, dives, and saves the extra run, excellent effort
Hogg to Silva, 1 run looped up on off stump, and Silva gently pats it back down the track past Hogg
Clarke to Silva, no run Silva advances, drives hard but finds the fielder at short cover
Clarke to Silva, 3 runs a bit of width outside off, Silva cuts hard and Hussey dives at third man to save a certain boundary
Clarke to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run drifting on the legs, Jayawardene nudges it to fine leg
Clarke to Silva, 1 run Silva gets down on his knees and sweeps it hard, square of the wicket
Clarke to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run pushed with soft hands to short cover and the batsmen set off for a quick single, excellent running by these two
Clarke to Silva, 2 runs tossed up on the pads, Silva waits on it and sweeps it fine
Hogg to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run tossed up on the pads, nudged to the on side
Hogg to Silva, 1 run Silva gets forward and steers it to Tait at point, takes off immediately
Hogg to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run flatter on middle and leg, turned towards square leg for an easy single
Hogg to Silva, no run reverse sweep but not well placed, Tait picks it up at point
Hogg to Silva, 1 run turned to the on side, they are picking the runs easily here
Hogg to Mahela Jayawardene, 3 runs delicately dabbed to third man, the balls races away towards the fence and Tait runs in from point to cut it off, good commitment in the end
Tait to Dilshan, no run full in the zone, he can only dig it out to Ponting at point
Tait to Dilshan, 2 runs fullish outside off stump, Dilshan carves it out to deep cover of the back foot
Tait to Dilshan, no run overpitched again, and this time he can only drive to the man at cover
Tait to Dilshan, 1 run back of a length outside off stump, Dilshan drives off the back foot through point for one
Tait to Arnold, 1 run fraction short and wide, Arnold nudges that in the air in the gap at gulley for one
Tait to Dilshan, OUT banged in short outside off stump, Dilshan hooks, awfully mistimed, and the ball just bobs up for Hodge to pouch a dolly at square leg
Clarke to Maharoof, no run tossed up on off stump, defended down the track
Clarke to Maharoof, 1 run tossed up again, lunged at and the inside-edge gets him a quick single to midwicket
Clarke to Arnold, no run tossed up on off stump, Arnold turns it to square leg
Clarke to Arnold, no run tossed up again, now he drives back down the track to Clarke
Clarke to Arnold, no run well bowled, tossed up and again he just turns it to the on side
Clarke to Arnold, 1 run quicker one outside off stump, pushed to point for a risky single
Tait to Arnold, no run short of a length over the top of off, he plays at it and the ball dies before Gilchrist
Tait to Arnold, 1 run back of a length this time, and now he pushes it softly to mid-off for one
Tait to Maharoof, 1 wide too full down leg stump, the yorker going wrong
Tait to Maharoof, 1 run very well bowled this time, yorker on leg stump, he jams the bat down and manages an inside-edge to leg

Tait to Arnold, OUT bowled 'em with another short one! Quick, too bouncy for Arnold, who stands rooted and gets cramped on the swipe, all tangled up, and the result is an inside-edge back onto the stumps
Tait to Kulasekara, no run full on leg stump, cant put it away
Tait to Kulasekara, 1 run strays to leg stump, and Kulasekara turns it off the pads for one out to the man on the ropes
Bracken to Kulasekara, no run beaten by one angled across the stumps, excellent length and carry again for him
Bracken to Kulasekara, no run and again, kicks off and seams past the bat off that superb length again

Bracken to Kulasekara, OUT edged and gone! Bracken maintains his probing, moving line outside off stump, shaping one across Kulasekara to drive on the up, and the thick edge is snapped up very well by Hayden at a deep lone slip, down near his ankles, his second beauty of the day
Bracken to Bandara, no run oh ho ho, beats him too with one pushed across the stumps
Bracken to Bandara, no run fuller on off stump, he gets over it and pushes to cover
Bracken to Bandara, no run full and wide again, moving across the stumps, and this time he leaves it be
Tait to Maharoof, no run bounces him over the top of off stump, Maharoof arches the back to get out of harm's way, the ball brushes the shirt and Gilchrist appeals
Tait to Maharoof, 1 run short of a length outside off stump, he stands rooted and opens the face of the bat to run it down to third man, well played
Tait to Bandara, no run good ball on a much fuller length, middle and offish, defended to midwicket
Tait to Bandara, 2 runs overpitched looking for another yorker, Bandara drives very neatly to Symonds moving around at mid-off
Tait to Bandara, no run bounces him again with one over off stump, Bandara sways out of the way like an accomplished batsman
Tait to Bandara, no run fuller this time on off stump, well played out to cover
Bracken to Maharoof, no run full outside off stump, driven off the front foot to point
Bracken to Maharoof, 1 run full outside off stump, driven loosely into the covers for a quick single
Bracken to Bandara, no run full, moving gently past the bat as Bandara chases it, Gilchrist whips off the bails
Bracken to Bandara, 1 run fraction shorter and wider, Bandara reaches for it and punches into the covers for one
Bracken to Maharoof, no run good length, moving past Maharoof who stands leaden-footed and misses it
Bracken to Maharoof, no run fullish length, Maharoof drives to short cover, no chance of a run
Clarke to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run pushed on off stump and driven easily to long-off
Clarke to Silva, no run swept but straight to short fine leg
Clarke to Silva, 1 run swept again but just a little wide of short fine leg, takes the single
Clarke to Mahela Jayawardene, 2 runs Jayawardene steps down and lofts it towards deep extra cover
Clarke to Mahela Jayawardene, no run pushed off the front foot to the off side
Clarke to Mahela Jayawardene, no run turned away towards short midwicket
Hogg to Silva, no run tossed up on middle and leg, he gets adventurous with a reverse sweep but makes a hash of it
Hogg to Silva, OUT goddim! Tossed up on middle and leg, now he prefers the more orthodox sweep, but mistimes it and the top-edge is easily gobbled up by Clarke at short fine leg, success for Hogg
Hogg to Dilshan, 1 run tossed up full, he uses he feet well and flicks to midwicket to get off the mark first ball
Hogg to Mahela Jayawardene, no run well bowled, looped up on a length and Jayawardene has to defend it
Hogg to Mahela Jayawardene, no run nicely done again, a tad flatter and he works it straight to square leg
Hogg to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run touch shorter and Jayawardene gets down low, pulling through square leg out to Hussey for one to keep hold of the strike
McGrath to Bandara, no run back of a length outside off stump, he whirls a cut but fails to beat Clarke at backward point
McGrath to Bandara, no run full outside off stump, driven right to Symonds at mid-off
McGrath to Bandara, SIX runs hello, baby! McGrath opts to rattle him with a long-hop outside off stump, but Bandara, cool as a pickle, stands and slams it over midwicket for half a dozen
McGrath to Bandara, no run overpitched outside off stump, and he square-drives to Clarke
McGrath to Bandara, 1 run yorker on about leg stump, pushed to mid-on
McGrath to Maharoof, 1 run another yorker going down leg stump and now Maharoof has work to do, fast, and he doesnt do it badly either
Clarke to Maharoof, 1 run tossed up outside off stump, pushed to mid-off
Clarke to Bandara, no run flatter, pushed to cover
Clarke to Bandara, SIX runs comes out, using the feet well, and connecting well for his second six, this time swung away over wide long-on
Clarke to Bandara, 1 leg bye quicker, flatter, spinning down leg stump, Bandara sweeps, misses, and scampers a leg bye to the off side
Clarke to Maharoof, no run tossed up on a length, he makes room to cut but ends up hitting into the ground
Clarke to Maharoof, 1 run tossed up, uses the feet to drive into the covers
Clarke to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run tossed up outside off stump, Jayawardene comes to the pitch and drives down to long-off for one
Clarke to Dilshan, no run flatter one comes into him as he goes back and pushes it to Clarke
Clarke to Dilshan, 1 run tossed up on a length, Dilshan stands and punches to mid-off for one
Clarke to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run full and flat on middle and leg, Jayawardene turns it to short fine leg for one
Clarke to Dilshan, 1 run quicker, flatter, and Dilshan cuts past point for the single
Clarke to Mahela Jayawardene, no run well bowled, flighted on middle and off and Jayawardene defends it back
Hogg to Dilshan, no run much quicker, some good bouncer too and he misses out on the cut
Hogg to Dilshan, no run short again, he cuts but cant beat point
Hogg to Dilshan, 1 run flighted on leg stump, he sweeps to short fine leg

Hogg to Mahela Jayawardene, OUT well bowled, well stumped! Hogg tosses up a beauty on a great length, Jayawardene lunges forward, plays for turn, is beaten in the flight and all Gilchrist has to do it whip off the bails as the back leg's in the air, neatly done, and Hogg gets another key batsman
Hogg to Arnold, no run tossed up outside off stump, Arnold drives and is beaten in the flight
Hogg to Arnold, no run theres the googly, spinning in sharply and catching Arnold going back outside leg stump
McGrath to Maharoof, FOUR runs right up there, full on middle and leg, and Maharoof times a perfect drive back down the ground for four
McGrath to Maharoof, (no ball) oversteps, bowls it outside off, just, and Maharoof heaves and misses
McGrath to Maharoof, FOUR runs full outside off stump, he swings again and this time gets a genuine french cut and with fine leg up, thats four all the way...McGrath isnt happy at all
McGrath to Maharoof, 1 run overpitched on off stump, now he gets down and swings it away through midwicket out to the sweeper for one
McGrath to Bandara, 1 run well bowled, yorker on off stump, Bandara backs away and just manages to get bat on it, chopping to point for the single
McGrath to Maharoof, 1 run full toss, which is swung out past Hogg at midwicket for one more
McGrath to Bandara, OUT he ends his spell with another, banging in a long-hop, Bandara pulls and can only balloon it up to Hogg at midwicket for a comfortable take
Bracken to Maharoof, FOUR runs up there, Maharoof has a free hit and connects well, slamming it down to long-off
Bracken to Maharoof, no run beaten this time, just standing and swinging across the line
Bracken to Maharoof, FOUR runs edged away for four, Maharoof thrashes at it, and the ball flies wide of Hayden at slip, good runs these for Sri Lanka
Bracken to Maharoof, OUT all over, Bracken finishes the innings with a slower one that Maharoof just chips in the air down to Symonds at long-on

Australia fight back well to keep Sri Lanka down to 226 inside 50 overs, nipping out seven wickets for 69 runs at the end. They do come hard at you, these Australians. Jayawardene and Silva forged a 140-run fourth-wicket stand to lift Sri Lanka, but Australia will fancy themselves to chase down 227 with an attack missing

Welcome back for the chase. Adam Gilchrist and Matthew Hayden at their respective positions. Dilhara Fernando has the ball in his hands. One slip in place for the left-handers. Crowd buzzing. 227 is the target at 4.50.
Fernando to Gilchrist, no run good length to begin with on off stump, just pushed to mid-on
Fernando to Gilchrist, no run good length outside off stump, Gilchrist gets forward and pushes straight to mid-off this time
Fernando to Gilchrist, no run back of a length now, and he hops across to off and pushes to point
Fernando to Gilchrist, 1 wide too full, swings down leg, and thats a good diving take from Sangakkara
Fernando to Gilchrist, (no ball) 3 runs swings into him, a no-ball too, and Gilchrist eases that into the midwicket region to open his account
Fernando to Hayden, FOUR runs thats a bad ball, a full toss outside leg stump that Hayden gladly tickles fine for four, first ball
Fernando to Hayden, 1 wide he puts too much effort into this one, bowling it very full and wide outside off stump from over the stumps this time
Fernando to Hayden, no run better, much better, back of a length outside off stump and then moving over the top of off as Hayden stands tall and shoulders arms
Fernando to Hayden, 1 wide slides down leg stump again, as Hayden misses out on the attempted nudge off the hips
Fernando to Hayden, no run back of a length on the stumps, worked to midwicket
Maharoof to Gilchrist, no run good start from over the wicket, landing it on a good length and Gilchrist eases that to mid-off
Maharoof to Gilchrist, no run back of a length just outside off stump, Gilchrist gets forward and pushes to mid-off once more
Maharoof to Gilchrist, no run back of a length again, this time he stands and cracks it to point, cant beat the gap
Maharoof to Gilchrist, no run tight delivery, back of a length on off stump, tapped back down the track
Maharoof to Gilchrist, no run good length this time, pushed to mid-off
Maharoof to Gilchrist, FOUR runs not a half-volley, but his timing is perfect, crunching a drive past mid-off for four
Fernando to Hayden, no run short of a length, left alone
Fernando to Hayden, no run short of a length, he shoulders arms covering off stump
Fernando to Hayden, no run banged in shorter on off stump, Hayden hustles to get behind it and defends it back
Fernando to Hayden, no run back of a length again, he gets up and defends to the covers
Fernando to Hayden, no run short of a length, up he goes, pushing off the back foot to cover
Fernando to Hayden, no run overpitches this time, but Hayden drives right to short extra cover
Maharoof to Gilchrist, no run fraction short, Gilchrist cuts hard but cant beat short point
Maharoof to Gilchrist, no run short of a length, steered to backward point
Maharoof to Gilchrist, no run shorter this time, and he ends up chopping into the ground
Maharoof to Gilchrist, no run good length on, pushed back down the ground to Maharoof
Maharoof to Gilchrist, 1 run good length outside off stump, pitch is sluggish, Gilchrist drives and gets an inside-edge to short fine leg
Maharoof to Hayden, no run overpitched, he drives to short extra cover
Fernando to Gilchrist, no run fuller length delivery, Gilchrist comes on the frontfoot and punches it to cover
Fernando to Gilchrist, no run slower delivery, good length, Gilchrist checks his shot at the last minute and defends it
Fernando to Gilchrist, no run fuller length delivery, he comes forward and punches it to cover
Fernando to Gilchrist, (no ball) slower one, he oversteps, Gilchrist swings and misses
Fernando to Gilchrist, no run good length outside off stump, driven into the covers
Fernando to Gilchrist, 1 run slower ball, quite short, Gilchrist opens the face and runs it to third man
Fernando to Hayden, no run good length on off stump, Hayden gets behind the line and defends it back
Maharoof to Gilchrist, no run back of a length outside off stump, he stands and defends in front of point
Maharoof to Gilchrist, no run good length, square-driven to a diving Arnold at forward point
Maharoof to Gilchrist, 1 run fuller, Gilchrist gets impatient and has an ugly heave at it, its mistimed and spooned up and over to third man, no pace in the delivery to hit
Maharoof to Hayden, 2 runs banged in a fraction short, Hayden pulls through midwicket, slow outfield does the rest
Maharoof to Hayden, SIX runs massive, was full outside off stump, Hayden aims to go long, and does so very well, clubbing it over mid-on for six
Maharoof to Hayden, no run shorter this time, he pulls impatiently but cant get it past the on side
Fernando to Gilchrist, (no ball) short of a length from around the stumps, another no-ball, Gilchrist just defends to the off

Fernando to Gilchrist, no run dropped! Fernando serves up a slower ball, Gilchrist doesnt read it, gets back and across and pushes at it early, the ball goes to Arnold at short cover, he jumps up, gets fingers to it, and lets it slip
Fernando to Gilchrist, FOUR runs well timed, overpitched and Gilchrist punches back down between bowler and umpire for four
Fernando to Gilchrist, no run back of a length, angling into him, he hops up and defends
Fernando to Gilchrist, no run good length outside off stump, he comes forward and drives to cover
Fernando to Gilchrist, 2 runs quicker one, comes in off a short length, squaring him up totally, leading edge goes safely through the vacant gulley region
Fernando to Gilchrist, no run back of a length outside off stump, he gets behind the line and pushes to point
Maharoof to Hayden, 3 runs fraction wide of off stump, he waits for it and cuts late down to third man, and gets a well-run three
Maharoof to Gilchrist, no run back of a length outside off stump, he waits for it and attempts a cut, but the lack of pace does him in, hits into the ground
Maharoof to Gilchrist, 1 run short, he pulls, finds the man at deep mid-on for just the single
Maharoof to Hayden, no run back of a length, driven off the back foot to short extra cover, Jayawardene
Maharoof to Hayden, 2 runs overpitched, Hayden drives to mid-off, where Kulasekara misfields, parrying the ball back over his head after the dive, bad bounce perhaps
Maharoof to Hayden, no run fraction shorter, Hayden cuts hard to Kulasekara at mid-off again, who fields well second time around
Fernando to Gilchrist, no run full delivery on off stump, Gilchrist goes back and turns it to midwicket
Fernando to Gilchrist, no run well bowled, yorker, dug out to Jayawardene at short extra cover
Fernando to Gilchrist, FOUR runs short of length outside off stump, Gilchrist hops to off and opens the face, gliding it - or was it an edge? - down to third man, who's very wide, for four
Fernando to Gilchrist, no run marginally overpitched outside off stump, and he square-drives to backward point

Fernando to Gilchrist, FOUR runs now he bangs in one short down leg stump, Gilchrist gets into position to pull, waits, waits - its very slow, you see - and then gets bat on it to pick up four to fine leg
Fernando to Gilchrist, no run pitches it very wide of off stump, Gilchrist gets down and reaches for it, cutting along the ground to backward point
Maharoof to Hayden, no run overpitched, driven back to him
Maharoof to Hayden, FOUR runs dragged in short, nicely pulled between midwicket and mid-on to raise the 50
Maharoof to Hayden, FOUR runs again short, again pulled away, this time in front of square
Maharoof to Hayden, 1 run back of a length on off stump, he gets back and across and pushes wide of mid-on for one
Maharoof to Gilchrist, 2 runs fraction short and wide, he goes back and opens the face, placing it behind point and gulley and running hard
Maharoof to Gilchrist, no run back of a length, pushed straight to mid-off
Kulasekara to Hayden, no run back of a length on off stump, pushed to mid-off
Kulasekara to Hayden, no run back of a length outside off stump, pushed to mid-off
Kulasekara to Hayden, FOUR runs a fraction short, he hammers it across the line, no protection out in the deep and Hayden picks up another boundary
Kulasekara to Hayden, FOUR runs shot, sir! He over-compensates with a fuller one, in the zone to be hit, and Hayden follows through with a bunt down the ground to long-off
Kulasekara to Hayden, 1 run short of a length on middle and off, he shuffles and nudges it to mid-on for an easy single
Kulasekara to Gilchrist, 1 run back of a length on leg stump, tucked wide of square for a single
Arnold to Gilchrist, no run back of a length, pushed to midwicket
Arnold to Gilchrist, 1 run tossed up, driven to mid-on this time
Arnold to Hayden, SIX runs tossed up, gets to the pitch, and tees-off with a biff over extra cover for half a dozen!
Arnold to Hayden, no run quicker, flatter on middle and leg, nudged to square leg
Arnold to Ponting, no run tossed up on a length outside off stump, he hops back and defends it
Kulasekara to Gilchrist, 1 run back of a length on off stump, he goes back and tucks it to short fine leg for one
Kulasekara to Ponting, no run back of a length on off stump, Ponting gets behind the line and defends it back down the pitch
Kulasekara to Ponting, 1 run gets off the mark by late cutting a flat delivery down to third man for one
Kulasekara to Gilchrist, no run back of a length now from around the wicket, defended to cover
Kulasekara to Gilchrist, no run short of a length outside off stump, pushed to Bandara at mid-off this time
Kulasekara to Gilchrist, no run low full toss, square-driven to point
Arnold to Ponting, no run flatter one on off stump, Ponting goes back and turns it to short midwicket
Arnold to Ponting, 1 run tossed up on middle and off, flicked out to deep midwicket

Arnold to Gilchrist, OUT gone, Arnold, and in the Powerplays! Fires one quicker outside off stump, Gilchrist thrusts the pad forward, the bat is late, gets hit in line of middle and off, every man in blue in the ring goes up, and Aleem Dar has little hesitation in raising the finger!
Arnold to Clarke, 1 run tossed up on middle and off, worked to midwicket to get off the mark
Arnold to Ponting, no run quicker, flatter, pushed back to Arnold
Arnold to Ponting, 1 run tossed up, he uses the feet and theres that trademark flick into the deep
Kulasekara to Ponting, 2 runs short and wide, he leans into it and places it well behind square for two as third man runs around
Kulasekara to Ponting, no run good length outside off stump, he leans into it and pushes to cover
Kulasekara to Ponting, no run tad fuller, he gets the foot out and drives back to Kulasekara's left
Kulasekara to Ponting, no run full again, now he gets to the pitch and drives into the covers
Kulasekara to Ponting, (no ball) 1 run oversteps, back of a length, Ponting reacts quickly and glides it down to third man
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run fuller outside off stump, he drives at it and gets undone by the uneven bounce
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run fuller, honing in on off stump, pushed back to Kulasekara
Bandara to Ponting, 1 run flipped up from over the stumps, full, Ponting lunges forward, gets an inside-edge to square leg for one
Bandara to Clarke, no run looped up nicely on off stump, Clarke gets forward and blocks it out
Bandara to Clarke, 1 run quicker through the air, Clarke times the drive nicely back past Bandara to long-off
Bandara to Ponting, no run looped up again, he drives back down the track
Bandara to Ponting, 1 run fuller on middle and leg, swept fine for one
Bandara to Clarke, 1 run flighted up outside off stump, Clarke drives to Jayasuriya, back at mid-off
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run good length on off stump, no room on offer, Clarke gets over it in defence
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run straighter one, flicked to Tharanga at short midwicket
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run good length outside off stump, driven straight to Jayawardene at cover
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run good length again, Clarke drives back to Kulasekara
Kulasekara to Clarke, FOUR runs quicker, fuller, wider, Clarke flashes the drive, gets a thick edge, and the ball races down to third man
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run good length on off stump, driven to mid-on
Bandara to Ponting, FOUR runs tossed up, pitches and spins short, back he goes, waiting, and then punches through the off side gap for four
Bandara to Ponting, no run looped up, tighter line, Ponting gets over it and smothers the spin
Bandara to Ponting, no run flatter on off stump, flicked to Fernando at regulation mid-on
Bandara to Ponting, no run fizzed up on leg stump, swept but straight to short fine leg
Bandara to Ponting, no run looped up, driven to point
Bandara to Ponting, no run looped up invitingly, but Ponting prefers to defend to cover
Fernando to Clarke, no run back of a length outside off stump, a loosener, which Clarke shoulders arms to
Fernando to Clarke, no run fuller now, Clarke comes forward and drives, ending up with an inside-edge to square leg
Fernando to Clarke, no run short of a length on off stump, Clarke gets up on the toes, behind the line, and defends back to Fernando
Fernando to Clarke, FOUR runs shot, overpitched, and he gives it what it deserves, a classical drive through the covers to raise the 100
Fernando to Clarke, FOUR runs carbon copy of the shot, another half-volley is dispatched between cover and mid-off, all timing and control
Fernando to Clarke, no run quicker, back of a length outside off stump, he gets a stride in and shoulders arms
Bandara to Ponting, no run short and wide, cut to point, where Silva cops one on the neck as he dives
Bandara to Ponting, FOUR runs tossed up, Ponting sees mid-off is up, dances down, and clubs it down the ground
Bandara to Ponting, no run quicker, flatter, Ponting cuts behind square where Tharanga dives to his left and saves runs
Bandara to Ponting, 2 runs tossed up, he waits for it and opens the face to run it down to third man
Bandara to Ponting, 3 runs tossed up, he uses the feet again and chips over midwicket's head for three

Bandara to Clarke, no run quicker, spins into him as he makes room, dabs it towards short third man, Tharanga moves across, collects, fires in a good throw back to Bandara, but Ponting's just home safe
Jayasuriya to Ponting, 1 run tossed up, Ponting defends towards points, opening the face of the bat
Jayasuriya to Clarke, 1 run full on off stump, uses the feet well to drive into the covers
Jayasuriya to Ponting, 1 run tossed up, Ponting drives down to long-off for one
Jayasuriya to Clarke, no run flighted again, Clarke drives to Jayawardene at short extra cover
Jayasuriya to Clarke, no run quicker one, he drives to short extra cover again
Jayasuriya to Clarke, 1 run shorter and really wide, he reaches across and dabs it wide of point for a single
Bandara to Clarke, 1 run he comes out, Bandara sees him and bowls wide, Clarke chases and nudges to point
Bandara to Ponting, 1 run flatter, spins away and Ponting cuts into the covers
Bandara to Clarke, FOUR runs tossed up, Clarke uses the feet well and cover-drives for four, wonderful to watch
Bandara to Clarke, no run looped up, this time he pushes between cover and point, but both men move well to stop
Bandara to Clarke, no run flighted up, he defends well
Bandara to Clarke, no run looped up, no room to cut or drive and Clarke thrusts bat and pad together
Jayasuriya to Ponting, no run tossed up outside off stump, Ponting gets across and plays with soft hands
Jayasuriya to Ponting, no run tossed up down leg stump now, Ponting misses out on the sweep
Jayasuriya to Ponting, no run flatter line, cut to point
Jayasuriya to Ponting, 1 run flat and quite wide, he chases it and dabs it past point for an easy single
Jayasuriya to Clarke, no run tossed up, Clarke gets forward and then back, cutting to backward point
Jayasuriya to Clarke, 1 run flat on the stumps, he adjusts and punches down to long-on for one

Bandara to Clarke, OUT good catch! Bandara hustles in, loops one up, Clarke uses the feet well, drives hard to extra cover, but fails to keep it down, and Dilshan gets forward and clings on to it an inch before the ground. Clarke isnt convinced, stands his ground. Bandara knows its out. Both umpires confer and yes
Bandara to Symonds, no run looped up outside off stump, left alone as it spins past him
Bandara to Symonds, no run looped up, defended
Bandara to Symonds, 1 run quicker one, Symonds drives out to long-off
Bandara to Ponting, 1 run looped up on the stumps, driven to mid-on
Bandara to Symonds, 1 run quicker one, he goes back and just gets bat on it, wouldve been interesting if he'd missed, gets one to square leg
Jayasuriya to Symonds, 2 runs full outside leg, Symonds clips it out to Tharanga moving out from long-on
Jayasuriya to Symonds, no run straighter one, Symonds shuffles in front of the stumps and tentatively pokes it back
Jayasuriya to Symonds, no run tossed up, he defends to cover
Jayasuriya to Symonds, no run tossed up on off stump, he defends it back
Jayasuriya to Symonds, no run quicker, flatter, now he mistimes the drive into the ground
Jayasuriya to Symonds, 1 run straighter one, Symonds shuffles and works it behind square for one
Bandara to Symonds, 1 run flatter length, he goes back and punches to cover
Bandara to Ponting, FOUR runs looped up, he waits for it and finds the gap behind point for four runs, well cut
Bandara to Ponting, no run tossed up, Ponting uses the feet and on-drives to Fernando at mid-on
Bandara to Ponting, 1 run flatter on middle and leg, nudged to square leg
Bandara to Symonds, no run fired in on leg stump, Symonds drives back to Bandara
Bandara to Symonds, 1 run looped up, he too uses the feet and drives it down to long-off
Jayasuriya to Symonds, no run tossed up on off stump, driven to Tharanga at short midwicket
Jayasuriya to Symonds, no run tossed up, defended off the front foot
Jayasuriya to Symonds, no run tossed up, defended off the front foot
Jayasuriya to Symonds, 2 runs flatter, shorter, he goes back and cuts into the covers, finding the gap and collecting two

Jayasuriya to Symonds, no run tossed up, Symonds drives back down the track, Jayasuriya reaches out to his right, the ball kisses his fingers, and ricochets onto the stumps, the decision is referred and its decided that Ponting was just back in...whew, was close
Jayasuriya to Symonds, no run flat, he goes back and drives to short extra cover
Arnold to Ponting, 1 run tossed up, Ponting drives past mid-off for one
Arnold to Symonds, 1 run full and flat on off stump, he uses the feet and drives to mid-on
Arnold to Ponting, no run spins away outside off stump, he opens the face and runs it to point
Arnold to Ponting, no run tossed up again, now he drives to cover
Arnold to Ponting, 1 run width offered and he cuts into the covers
Arnold to Symonds, 1 wide tossed up wide, he goes for the booming drive, misses
Arnold to Symonds, no run short and flat, driven off the back foot to cover
Jayasuriya to Ponting, 1 run too full on leg stump, swept past short fine leg, a poor throw from Maharoof at fine leg lets Symonds off, as he tripped and fell and was nowhere in the frame
Jayasuriya to Symonds, SIX runs oh shot! Dances down, collecting one on leg stump and depositing it into the long-on stands
Jayasuriya to Symonds, no run quicker one, he defends off the front foot
Jayasuriya to Symonds, 1 run tossed up, he defends off the front foot to the on side and runs hard
Jayasuriya to Ponting, no run tossed up, defended to the off side
Jayasuriya to Ponting, 1 run short and wide, he mistimes the cut and ends up dragging it to the leg side
Arnold to Ponting, no run comes out, Arnold fires it in quick, Ponting defends
Arnold to Ponting, 2 runs spins into him, cheekily run off the face of the bat down to third man
Arnold to Ponting, 1 run tossed up, he comes down and chips it in the air over short midwicket
Arnold to Symonds, 1 run tossed up, Symonds waits for it and pushes in front of point for one
Arnold to Ponting, 2 runs flat, wide, spins into him as he backs away to leg and punches out to the sweeper on the off side
Arnold to Ponting, no run tossed up, he lunges forward and gets beaten
Jayasuriya to Symonds, SIX runs full toss, and its rightly hammered away over cow corner for six
Jayasuriya to Symonds, 1 run tossed up outside off stump, he rocks back and pushes to mid-off
Jayasuriya to Ponting, 1 run flat, spins into him, he again rocks back and cuts out to deep point
Jayasuriya to Symonds, no run flat, Symonds comes forward and defends it
Jayasuriya to Symonds, FOUR runs flat again, spins in, Symonds rocks back and cuts with some power to bisect cover and point and beat the sweeper, wow
Jayasuriya to Symonds, no run quicker, flatter and he gets back and across to push it back
Dilshan to Ponting, 1 run begins short on the stumps, he rocks back and pulls to midwicket
Dilshan to Symonds, no run spins into him, he opens the face and runs it to point
Dilshan to Symonds, no run tossed up, defended off the front foot
Dilshan to Symonds, no run straighter one on the stumps, he shuffes and plays it to short midwicket
Dilshan to Symonds, no run straighter one on the stumps, he shuffes and plays it to short midwicket
Dilshan to Symonds, 1 run flat outside off stump, he makes room and drives off the backfoot into the covers
Bandara to Symonds, no run short, cut to point
Bandara to Symonds, FOUR runs looped up outside off stump, Symonds gets down on one knee and powerfully sweeps through midwicket, against the spin
Bandara to Symonds, FOUR runs full toss on off stump, he gets down and bottom-hand jabs that over midwicket for four more, he's just having fun out there, Symonds
Bandara to Symonds, no run this one spins the other way, he chases it and gets beaten
Bandara to Symonds, no run well flighted on off stump, he gets over it and defends
Bandara to Symonds, no run slower one outside off stump, he cuts and misses again, and thats drinks for all
Dilshan to Ponting, 1 run tossed up, he goes back and cuts out into the deep
Dilshan to Symonds, no run straight on the stumps, he gets behind the line and pushes it back
Dilshan to Symonds, 2 runs tossed up on off stump, he gets down and paddles it fine for runs
Dilshan to Symonds, 1 run tossed up, he plants the foot down and drives to long-on
Dilshan to Ponting, no run tossed up, Ponting drives to his right, Dilshan dives and field
Dilshan to Ponting, 1 run dragged short, now he pulls too hard through square
Bandara to Ponting, no run well flighted on leg stump, but paddled right to short fine leg
Bandara to Ponting, no run looped up full again, Ponting gets over it and smothers the spin
Bandara to Ponting, no run tossed up, defended
Bandara to Ponting, 1 run straighter one, he gets behind the line of the ball and pushes to mid-on
Bandara to Symonds, 1 run tossed up on middle and leg, on-driven for one
Bandara to Ponting, 1 run looped up, worked away to the on side
Dilshan to Ponting, no run tossed up on middle and off, flicked to mid-on
Dilshan to Ponting, 1 run fired on leg stump, Ponting paddles it down to fine leg
Dilshan to Symonds, no run tossed up on middle and off, nudged to midwicket
Dilshan to Symonds, 1 run flat, full, paddle-swept for one
Dilshan to Ponting, no run tossed up, he opens the face and guides it to backward point
Dilshan to Ponting, no run tossed up, he sweeps across the line and gets beaten
Maharoof to Symonds, 1 run back of a length outside off stump, run down to short third man
Maharoof to Ponting, 1 run short and wide, cut off the front foot past point for one more
Maharoof to Symonds, 1 run too full, and Symonds straight-drives down the ground to long-on
Maharoof to Ponting, no run slow, full on leg, worked to mid-on with utmost ease
Maharoof to Ponting, 1 run fuller length delivery middle and leg, Ponting flicks it to deep mid wicket
Maharoof to Symonds, (no ball) 1 run oversteps, Symonds runs it off the face of the bat to third man
Maharoof to Ponting, 1 run middle and leg, Ponting flicks it to deep mid wicket
Dilshan to Ponting, 1 run
Dilshan to Symonds, no run
Dilshan to Symonds, no run tossed up on a length, he goes back and defends
Dilshan to Symonds, no run straighter one, driven off the back foot to Dilshan
Dilshan to Symonds, no run on leg stump, worked to short fine leg
Dilshan to Symonds, no run
Maharoof to Ponting, 2 runs short of a length outside off stump, steered past gulley
Maharoof to Ponting, FOUR runs overpitched, and he lofts it over mid-off, top shot
Maharoof to Ponting, 1 run straight, one a length, he gets up whips it to square leg for a riskly single, throw hits but Symonds is home safe
Maharoof to Symonds, FOUR runs overpitched outside off stump, he welcomes the treat with a thumping cover drive that brings up his fifty, and that must feel good
Maharoof to Symonds, 2 runs short of a length, he opens the face and gets two to third man
Maharoof to Symonds, 1 run back of a length, chopped down to third man to keep strike
Dilshan to Symonds, no run tossed up, played back to Dilshan
Dilshan to Symonds, no run straighter one, he goes back and pushes back to Dilshan again
Dilshan to Symonds, 2 runs drifts to leg stump, Symonds turns it around the corner for an easy two
Dilshan to Symonds, 1 run tossed up, uses the feet, drives down to long-on
Dilshan to Ponting, no run tossed up on leg stump, worked right to square leg
Dilshan to Ponting, no run tossed up, lunges forward and defends to the off side
Bandara to Symonds, no run tossed up, cut to cover
Bandara to Symonds, no run tossed up, defended it back
Bandara to Symonds, 1 run tossed up on middle stump, played to midwicket
Bandara to Ponting, no run tossed up on leg stump, swept right to short fine leg
Bandara to Ponting, 1 run tossed up on leg stump, flicked out to deep mid-on
Bandara to Symonds, 1 run tossed up, gently pushed to point for a single
Dilshan to Symonds, 1 run tossed up on middle and off, on-driven to mid-on
Dilshan to Ponting, 1 run tossed up, driven to cover, misfield allows one
Dilshan to Symonds, no run drifts to leg stump, Symonds clips fine
Dilshan to Symonds, FOUR runs short, flat, going down leg, and he just swings it away behind square for four
Dilshan to Symonds, no run tossed up, defended with ease
Dilshan to Symonds, no run straighter one, pushed off the back foot to mid-on
Bandara to Ponting, no run looped up, he rocks back and cuts to point
Bandara to Ponting, no run spins away from him again, cut to that man once more
Bandara to Ponting, no run looped up, driven to cover
Bandara to Ponting, SIX runs finished in style, Australia romp home! Tossed up, he clears the leg and sends it rows back over long-on!
Do join us for tomorrow's much-hyped affair, England v South Africa at Bridgetown, at 13:30 GMT. Thats all from me, Jamie Alter. Good night/morning/evening/afternoon, wherever you may be. Cheers!

Australia just too good for anyone. Not one team has bothered them all tournament. You're going to need a lot to beat this team, A-game, B-game, call if what you will. Dismissed Sri Lanka cheaply, knocked off the runs without breaking a sweat, and I want to see what team beats Australia.
Australia won by 7 wickets (with 44 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Nathan Bracken, AUS
